Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui

Class DevelopmentCardShopGUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.stage.Window
javafx.stage.Stage
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.DevelopmentCardShopGUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.event.EventTarget
public class DevelopmentCardShopGUI
extends javafx.stage.Stage
Class DevelopmentCardShopGUI contains methods to handle the card shop in the GUI

  • Method Details

    • showCardShop

      public void showCardShop()
      Show the card shop.

    • setCards

      public void setCards​(java.lang.Integer[] cardIDs, boolean filter)
      Sets which cards are visible in the card shop. If filter is true only the buyable cards are shown, otherwise every card in the shop in shown.
      Parameters:
      cardIDs - are the card ids in the shop
      filter - determines which cards are shown

    • resetCardShop

      public void resetCardShop​(boolean changeButtonLabel)
      Remove the card shop from the stage and sets a new label is the parameter is true.
      Parameters:
      changeButtonLabel - is true if the label is to be changed, false otherwise

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getDevelopmentCardImageView​(int ID)
      Create the image of the card from its id.
      Parameters:
      ID - is the id of the card
      Returns:
      the image of the card

    • getLastPurchasedDevelopmentCard

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getLastPurchasedDevelopmentCard()
      Get the image of the last purchased card.
      Returns:
      the image of the card

    • updateCardShop

      public void updateCardShop​(java.lang.Integer[] cardShop)
      Update the card shop with the new card ids.
      Parameters:
      cardShop - is the new card shop
